Articles.Content:
Hi all! So im running my game with EVE and while I love it, I stumbled across TextureReplacer. 2 questions if I may...

1...do I only need to download that, as im sure I read somewhere that after installing the replacer, I need other downloads to run with it.

2...will it work with EVE installed? Im running 1.0.2?

Thankyou in advance ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Why not ask this in the TextureReplacer thread?

Honest question - that's the place where the largest amount of knowledge about the mod is concentrated. You will receive the best answers there.

> 
> Why not ask this in the TextureReplacer thread?
> Honest question - that's the place where the largest amount of knowledge about the mod is concentrated. You will receive the best answers there.

Ok thanks. Ive just searched for that yet cant seem to find it. Oh well, ill just try it and if it mashes up my install, ill try again.

- - - Updated - - -

Never mind, found it now:confused:
